LanguageData.ARA_TerrainMoveSpeedHediff.label: Creep Augmentation: Move Speed
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainMoveSpeedHediff.description: The woven fabric worn by this Arachnae Drone grants higher movement speed on creep. The effect strengthens the longer it remains on the creep and gradually decays upon leaving the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainWorkSpeedHediff.label: Creep Augmentation: Work Speed
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainWorkSpeedHediff.description: The woven fabric worn by this Arachnae Drone grants higher work speed on creep. The effect strengthens the longer it remains on the creep and gradually decays upon leaving the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCooldownHediff.label: Creep Augmentation: Combat Reaction
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCooldownHediff.description: The woven fabric worn by this Arachnae Drone reduces the cooldown time for melee and ranged attacks on creep. The effect strengthens the longer it remains on the creep and gradually decays upon leaving the creep.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainCooldownHediff.stages.0.label: none
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHealHediff.label: Creep Augmentation: Healing
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainHealHediff.description: The woven fabric worn by this Arachnae Drone grants the ability to heal others.
LanguageData.ARA_Heal_By_Nurse_Hediff.label: Swarm Healing
LanguageData.ARA_Heal_By_Nurse_Hediff.description: The healing agent of the Arachnae swarm causes abnormal proliferation of tissue cells, allowing for rapid wound healing.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTemptHediff.label: Creep Augmentation: Temptation
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTemptHediff.description: The woven fabric worn by this Arachnae Drone grants the ability to manipulate minds and confuse others.
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTerrorRoar_Hediff.label: Creep Augmentation: Roar
LanguageData.ARA_TerrainTerrorRoar_Hediff.description: The woven fabric worn by this Arachnae Drone grants the ability to emit a majestic roar, terrifying and startling enemies, causing them to flee in all directions.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Hediff.label: Creep Laying
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper_Hediff.description: This Arachnae Creep King is currently deploying creep, transforming the surrounding terrain at regular intervals.
